data.text:
Poppy Montgomery is expecting her second child, Peoplereports.

This will be the first child for the Unforgettablestar and her boyfriend Shawn Sanford, who began dating in late 2011. Montgomery also has a 5-year-old son with actor Adam Kaufman.

CBS revives Unforgettable for summer 2013 return

"Shawn and I are thrilled and Jackson is so excited to be a big brother," Montgomery said in a statement.

The Without a Tracealum is expected to return to Unforgettable when its second season airs on CBS this summer.

View original Poppy Montgomery Expecting Second Child at TVGuide.com
